pages.title: Somnium Usage
pages.text: The Somnium Usage essence is similar to the regenerations essence. However, this essence causes you to use less energy when using spells, artifacts or rings. You can use this essence 3 to 5 times.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: This essence can be crafted in a Somnium Infuser and requires loran energy and somnium.
